text: Martha Rose Reeves (born July 18, 1941) is an American singer. She was also a councilwoman in Detroit, Michigan. She was associated with R&B; group Martha and the Vandellas during the 1960s. Together, their hits included Dancing in the Street and Heat Wave. She had some solo songs, also. Reeves was a Detroit Councilwoman between 2005 and 2009. She was born in Alabama. She was raised in Detroit. ==Sources== Category:Politicians from Alabama Category:American R&B; musicians Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michigan
title: Martha Reeves
